message: Let's get this done quickly.  This seems like a fair split to me, considering the time pressure.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. We both have a lot to lose if we don't reach an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate the sentiment of your offer, but time is working against me. This is my final offer.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money with a 40/60 split in my favor. This will help us both avoid losing more money to inflation.
